descriptions.goal: Learn node.js, backend and react native to create mobile applications. Also I dream to learn Java and Swift for android and iOS developing. I aspire to become an all known programmer and attain Senior level
descriptions.interests: In my live a lot of hobbies, which help me to keep myself from going crazy, have a good time and improve myself...

1984.title: Birth year
1984.description: I was born, live and work in Kharkiv

2001.title: Graduated from lyceum
2001.description: Graduated from Kharkiv's University of Economy n.161

2005.title: Technician of private local network
2005.description: Connection of new users, expansion of network lines, retooling, adjustment of equipment

2007.title: Graduated from University
2007.description: Graduated from Kharkiv National University of Economy (KNUE) with excellent. Diploma's topic - Development of automated module 'Monitoring of payments for provided services in private local network' - grade 'A' (10)

2008.title: Technician-administrator of Airbites
2008.description: Adjustment of network's equipment and user's computers, cabling of new and maintenance of existed network lines

2010.title: Copyrighter/SEO optimizer/Content-manager
2010.description: Freelancer - writing articles, optimizing websites for promoting in searching systems, adding of content on websites through admin-panels or straight in html-code

2015.title: HTML/CSS coder
2015.description: Freelancer - webpage markup, adapting of CMS templates for customer's requirements, fixing bugs, designs creating

2016.title: Trainy frontend developer
2016.description: I was attended on 3 months paid trainy course in Demiart webstudio. During this time I produced 4 SPA websites, which were successfuly launched

2017.title: Frontend developer BigDrop
2017.description: Worked at BigDrop company for one year. I was responsible to frontend of multipage websites and online shops by custom design for integration with Wordpress

2018.title: Angular/React developer DigitalSuits
2018.description: React and Angular applications development, which were integrated with custom API. Support and modernization of existence API

2019.title: Currently
2019.description: Now I am looking for perspective company to fulfil my potential as Angular full-stack developer...

html.title: HTML Handbook on React
html.description: Interactive handbook of HTML tags on React/Redux technology. Filters, search, moveable mtitleu with tag pointer. Project was developing during 5 days on the bundler create-react-app.

magnat-lzr.title: Magnat headphones shop
magnat-lzr.description: Custom HTML5 Video player on home page, responsive markup with support of mobile devices. Modular JS script.

pizza.title: Application 'Pizzeria'
pizza.description: Educational project on Angular 2 (angular-cli). On the website implemented online store of pizzas, compiling from ingredients and adding to basket. All data saving in localStorage.

resume.title: Interactive Resume
resume.description: Application on Angular with internazionalization, viewing work from portfolio on different devices. Work created on Webpack bundler, data fetched from Firebase database, responsive design.

value.title: Value Garden Supply'
value.description: Crossbrowser markup of webpage by JPG layout. Responsive on my own opinion.

naturetour.title: Nature Tour Page
naturetour.description: Crossbrowser markup of webpage by PSD layout with implementation of slider on JavaScript. Responsive on my own opinion. Preprocessor LESS has used.

jokerbros.title: Game Room Jokerbros
jokerbros.description: Project on DB MySQL randomly choose winner from visitors, who get all bits of participants of the game. DB filters of game rooms, debit of losers and adding of new game rooms.

weather.title: Weather forecast from Yahoo
weather.description: Application 'Yahoo weather forecast' of all cities of the world. Used Yahoo Weather Api and different React plugins. Forecast on a week with graph of temperatures.

shoop.title: Online store
shoop.description: Project of online store on the custom CMS with admin-panel. Categories, goods, adding to basket, managment of goods in basket, authorization.

neews.title: News portal
neews.description: News portal implemented on PHP and DB MySQL. Devision of news on category, dates and magazines. Adding of articles through admin-panel, Users rights to adding and publication of news.

mmedia.title: Website of video studio
mmedia.description: Adapting of HTML5 template to the needs of company which creates video advertising. Introduction of videophone, changing of scripts, adding feature of sharing Youtube video.

icharger.title: Landing page iCharger
icharger.description: Markup of SPA for one day. Requirements – minimal functions, maximum speed. Embeding a parter script and using a scrolling script.

seo20min.title: SEO for 20 minutes
seo20min.description: Trainy project. Crossbrowser markup of webpage by JPG layout.

cloudnews.title: Cloudnews page
cloudnews.description: News hub webpage by PSD layout with pix to pix markup. Preprocessor SASS and Chrome extensions 'PerfectPixel' and 'Pix to Pix' are used

po-sekretu.title: Blog 'Po sekretu'
po-sekretu.description: Adapting of Wordpress template to blog of orderer. Enhancement of functionality through plugins, changing of design, adding features through PHP scripts. Hosting and support of website.

interests.code: Currently my main hobby - it's coding
interests.book: At free time I can read several books of well-known authors
interests.music: Music - it's essential companion. In my MP3 player always has needed track
interests.games: Such games as UNO, Alias, Monopoly, Mafia - it's a good reason to meet with my friends and have a good time with them
interests.bike: Bicycle it's a reason to get active leisure, especially in a company of my friends during a long trip
interests.snowboard: Snowboard – it's my major extreme hobby. It's a pity that the winter is not last all year
interests.windsurf: Windsurf – it's a youth's hobby, and a kind of sport, where I've had succeed
interests.kite: Kite – it's a freedom on sea's spaces. During sea trip I definitely go into the sea with kite equipment
interests.tennis: Tennis – it's a hobby of my youth, which have growned in something more. Before study in university I had category if Candidate Master of Sports, but now i'm just amateur
interests.smoke: I don't smoke, what help me feel myself good too
interests.cgames: I try to save my free time to more usefull things instead of computer game
interests.angry: I'm not tended to dissatisfaction, grouchiness and angry

fast-start.title: Быстрый старт
fast-start.description: Вникаю в проект в течение 1-2 дней, умею быстро настроить свое окружение для начала работы, также могу освоить новую технологию довольно быстро

team-player.title: Командный игрок
team-player.description: Неоднократно встречал полное взаимопонимание со стороны участников проекта, с которыми мне приходилось работать. Никогда не конфликтую с коллегами, а наоборот стараюсь поддержать позитивную атмосферу

clear-code.title: Чистый код
clear-code.description: В результате рефакторинга большого количества кода понял, что код нужно писать чистым и понятным для других разработчиков - поэтому в моей работе стараюсь придерживаться этого правила и совершенствоваться в этом направлении

diligent.title: Добросовестность
diligent.description: Честность и добросовестность - это качества, которым придерживаюсь в любой ситуации.

energetic.title: Энергичность
energetic.description: Все мои коллеги на прошлых местах работы были рады работать со мной в одном проекте благодаря моей энергичности и позитиву. Это качество также позволяет мне быстро справляться со своей работой

communicate.title: Коммуникабельность
communicate.description: Умение общаться с людьми - это один жизненно важный навык для программиста, поэтому я не упускаю возможности пообщаться с коллегами, как по работе, так и вне её

quick-learn.title: Быстрая обучаемость
quick-learn.description: Быстро осваиваю новую информацию и умею в кратчайшие сроки начать пользоваться незнакомым плагином или технологией

productivity.title: Продуктивность
productivity.description: На прошлых работах меня ценили за быстровыполненную работу
